item.title: The Hard Thing About Hard Things - Ben Horowitz: Book Review
item.description: I came across 'The Hard Thing About Hard Things' while reading an article about Ben Horowitz's venture capital firm and it was intriguing enough that I bought it and then read through it over a couple of days. Although the blurb suggests that it's a book about about building and running a startup I think a lot of the lessons are applicable for any business.
